name: inseparably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that cannot be separated: These two causes are inseparably linked. This show is all about the singing, which is inseparably intertwined with the acting. See
inseparable
More examplesFewer examplesShe wrote poetry and prose that was attached inseparably to the structure of the Russian language.There's an inviting downtown waterfront that ties San Francisco inseparably to its bay.The musicians, actors and choreographers who make up the dance company work together inseparably.
